overview: Liu Bang has inherited forty million yuan of inheritance, and he spent flowers at his aunt ’s funeral, which he cannot forget. Later, it developed into an inalienable relationship, so he asked Feng to pursue his wife Xin in order to collect evidence of adultery. In the end, Feng couldn't help falling in love with Xin, and killed Bang with the wrong hand. He was arrested and put in prison, but Xin and Hua drifted away ...
title: Scorpio
